K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:69b-1: a'arya sapta buddha ka na n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-1: rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-4: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-5: bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-6: na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-8: dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-9: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-16: de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-17: ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-18: tu bzhugs so // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-19: ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na dge slong
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-20: zhig 'byung pos zin nas brdol cing gcer bu gos
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-21: med la lag pa bsgreng ste du zhing 'dug pa
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-22: tu bzhugs so // gzigs so // de nas byang
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-23: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-24: pos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-25: bus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-26: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-27: mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70a-30: nam mkha'i dkyil na gyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa 'di dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-0: @70b dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis pa lag pa stong pa gcig shos 'di'ang su zhig lags /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-2: sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-5: 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-6: gcig shos 'di'ang nad kyis btab pa yin no //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-8: sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-9: ces gsol to // nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-10: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-13: de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-14: bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-15: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-16: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-17: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-18: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-28: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:70b-29: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-3: gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-6: de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-8: sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-9: dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-10: de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-12: skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te zos na pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-13: nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-17: mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas la /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-20: skrangs nad kyis btab pa rnams la sna ma'i mar dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-23: nye'u shing rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-24: las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-25: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-26: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-27: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-28: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71a-32: aom pa tsa pa tsa p'a tsa ya p'a tsa ya sarba bh'u t'a n'am/
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-0: tshindha ya k'i @71b la ya pa ra bidy'a n'am sva'ah'a /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-2: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-3: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-5: rmi lam ngan pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-6: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-7: rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-8: gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zungs shig /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-10: gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-11: de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-12: gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-13: gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-14: 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-15: phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-16: // de nas 'di'i cho ga gzhan ni nad thams cad la skud pas bcing bar bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-17: 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-19: skud pas bdag la bsrung ngo //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-20: byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud pa sngon po gdags so //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-21: mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-22: gzhan dag la'ang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-23: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-24: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:71b-25: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-1: cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-8: ku la aut+s'a dha n'am ku ru /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-11: gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-13: da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa ste /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-15: khyod kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag zungs shig /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-19: de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-22: rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing chu dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-23: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-24: gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs so //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-28: dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang bar langs nas mgo bkrus te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-30: brjod na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-31: bar 'gyur ro // de la sems can sdang ba gang dag dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-32: rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-33: sems can thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72a-34: 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-0: 'gyed pa thams @72b cad la skud pa dkar po gdags so //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-1: mig nad la shing 'o ma can las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdags so //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-2: dmag rengs par byed 'dod pas zho dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-3: sbrang rtsi la sbags pa'i 'bras yos la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-4: r'a dza n'am r'a dza m'a tram b'a ba sh'i ka ro tu k'a me na /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-5: 'o ma can gyi shing gi spar shing gis me
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-6: bus la bsreg bya til dag la lan stong sbyin
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-8: sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-9: sdig pa byang zhing dpal chen po dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-10: nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrub par 'dod na /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-11: 'o ma can gyi shing gi spar shing gis me
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-12: bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin sreg
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-13: bya'o // sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-14: rig sngags thams cad grub par 'dod pa dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-26: 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-27: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig smyung bar bya zhing bum pa sar ba bzhag ste /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-28: zla ba nya ba la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-29: snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags la khrus bya'o
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-30: // dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-31: rgyas kyi spyan sngar seng ldeng gi thur ma ba'i
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-32: lci bar smyugs pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:72b-33: te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyur
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-0: @73a *// 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la'ang sbyar bar byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-2: steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te sems can thams
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-3: cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-4: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-5: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-17: ki t'a pa ya n'a ma sv'ah'a /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-20: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dad sel ces bya
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-21: ba gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-22: shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-23: kyis zungs shig / blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-26: dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-27: dad pa rnyed nas khrus byas te bcom ldan 'das
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-30: spos dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-31: lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par gyur na tshe rabs
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-32: bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73a-33: lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-0: yang mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal @73b por bsgyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-1: yang na cho ga bzhin du sgrub na de mir
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-2: skye ba tha ma thob par 'gyur te 'di nas
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-3: shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-4: du skye bar 'gyur te tshe 'di la'ang rtag tu
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-5: brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-8: skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-9: 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-10: // ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod na bza' ba
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-11: thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-12: // bya'o // lhog rgal gcod na zangs khab kyis bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-15: 'ching ba thams cad las thar bar bya na lan
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-16: bdun bzlas brjod bya ste rtag tu nor yang 'phel
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-18: log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-19: ji ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-20: des phyogs gtsang mar mchod rten gyi 'khor sar dkyil
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-21: 'khor bskus la aa ga rus bdugs te lan stong
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-22: rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-23: de'i drung du sngas shar phyogs su bstan te nyal na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-24: yid la ci smon pa de thams cad ston to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-27: pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-28: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-29: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-30: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:73b-31: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-3: na ma: ka na ka mu na me /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-8: aom sa ra sa ra sa ra sa ra /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-9: si ri si ri si ri si ri /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-11: dha ma dha ma dha ma dha ma /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-12: dhu ma dhu ma dhu ma dhu ma /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-14: na mo na ma: ka na ka mu na ye /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-19: chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-22: gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-23: tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-26: lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-27: dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-28: dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-29: gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-32: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-33: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab par 'gyur /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-34: dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-35: sngon gyi las kyi sgrib par gyur pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-36: ci ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed par
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-37: 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74a-38: gam / aa ga ru'i bdug pas bdugs la gza' thams cad la khrus bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-0: mchin skran la shu dag 'jam @74b po btags pa
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-1: sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-2: kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bskus
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-3: na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-4: zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-5: spyan sngar sna ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-6: lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgo la bcings
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-7: na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-8: mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byas na brjed byed las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-9: lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog gis bdug go /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-10: de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-11: las thams cad byad pa zhes bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-13: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-14: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-15: 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-19: aom ha ra ha ra ha ra /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-21: na ma: k'a shya p'a ya /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-25: si dhyandu mantra pa dee sv'ah'a /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-26: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-27: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-28: po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-30: snying po 'di na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:74b-31: klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bya ma snyed dag
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-7: mtshan mo lan gsum gsum bzlas rjod byed na mdor
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-8: na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-9: 'gyur ro // de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-10: sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-11: las thams cad la'ang sbyor bar bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-13: sha bkra la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-14: ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar lan
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-15: stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bklags shing bkrus na sos
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-16: par 'gyur ro // klad pa na ba la sangs
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-17: rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-18: par 'gyur ro // sngar bzhag ste / sangs rgyas
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-19: kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-20: par 'gyur ro // sngar bzhag ste / // thams cad du'ang sbyar bar bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-22: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi phyir
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-23: rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to; ;na mo buddh'a
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-27: ghu me ghu me ma h'a ghu me /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-28: ta le ta le ma h'a ta le /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-29: tsa le tsa le ma h'a tsa le /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-30: dhu re dhu re ma h'a dhu re /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-31: ti ri ti ri mah'a ti ri /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-32: ki li ki li mah'a ki li /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-33: tsu ru tsu ru mah'a tsu ru /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-34: mi li mi li mah'a mi li /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-35: ti li ti li mah'a ti li /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-36: dhu me dhu me mah'a dhu me /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-37: tsa le tsa le mah'a tsa le /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75a-38: khi ri khi ri ma h'a khi ri /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-0: tsi li tsi li ma h'a tsi li @75b sv'ah'a /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas byang
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-2: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-3: po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-5: klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-7: sprin bzlog na shing ka ra b'i ra'i lcug mas bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-10: khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-11: cho ga thams cad kyis dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o //
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po yi rangs te /
K10D0270=D0512=D0852_H0272:75b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
